ref: 6191 darád f. ʻ bank, precipice, mountain ʼ lex. &rcirclemacr - But perh. of non -- Aryan origin, cf. darád -- ʻ a people adjoining Kashmir ʼ Pat., darada -- MBh., dara -- ʻ name of a mountain ʼ ViṣṇuP., and dardara -- ʻ a mountain in the south ʼ MBh., Pa. daddara -- (poss. ← Drav. EWA ii 21)]
M. daraḍ f. ʻ steep acclivity or high ground, bank ʼ.
